modName: Alexandra -The Bitten Peasant- A Vampire Follower
summary: Alexandra is available as either a non-vampire Imperial Race member to be infected by the user using certain Vampire Overhaul\'s or as a Imperial Race Vampire. They both have the same perks and spells.
descriptionHtml:
[CENTER][IMG]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/12989-1-1340985463.jpg[/IMG][/CENTER]

[center][b][size= 8 ][color=Black][font=timesnewroman]Alexandra -The Bitten Peasant-[/font][/color][/b][/center][/size]

[b][color= red][size= 4 ]Alexandra is a standalone mod of my Alessandra: Vampiric Follower Bitten Peasant version that I did some time ago. This standalone has been requested by a few people so I felt compelled to oblige. She is located in Morthal at the Moorside Inn. Alexandra is Imperial by birth and is marriageable and set non-essential. There are two versions one is a member of the Imperial Vampire Race and the other is not infected. There are Vampire mods that prefer you to have followers that are \"clean\" so that the mod can infect them. 

Please feel free to leave comments and upload pictures! :)
[/b][/color][/size] 

[b][color=wheat]
Required Files;
ApachiiSkyHair 1.2

Optional Files: To make her look like she does in my images

I used Bella\'s Better Females, Makeup variant 1 and No Shine (some pics) on her in combination with pretty lips by Danariel
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2812
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=1167
Darker Feminine Brows by Caliente (CBBE) 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666
Pretty Lips by Danariel
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=1167

Her body in my images is CBBEv3 with Navetseas body Muscle V2 textures. (She can be used with whatever body you prefer) (GlossTech V5 \"No Shine\" used in some pics)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6554
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666

She is wearing a Vanilla Farm Outfit in my pics and comes to you nude so you can dress her as you wish. Her inventory includes an iron dagger and a few loose pocket items. 
[/b][/color]

[B][COLOR=GHOSTWHITE]Thanks for checking out my mod and please endorse her if you like her! :) 

Regards,

FB[/b][/color]
author: FalmerBane
